page.title: 05Moat Farm, Five Oak Green
page.content: Moat Farm is owned by Mr.Scripps and managed by Mr.Newman.Many crops are grow,Conference and Comice pears , Bramly apples,hops,barley,wheat and corn. The fruit harvest takes approximately 3 weeks.Eight coldstores keep the fruit fresh until packing begins.In the pack house,a large brick building,local women pack the fruit. A mechanical grader grades the fruit to various standards. Packing begins in January and continues to July.Fruit is packed in polybags,palettes and cardboard boxes. New Zealand students help around e farm;accomodation is being erected forthem. Behind the farm is a hoppicking machine.Hopbinesn are hung onn a moving rail and taken into the machine which shreds and separates the leaves and the stalks ready for the oasts.
